quest.name: Slug It Out
journal: Jayanti seems to have reservations about her next outing.
objectives: Use the flat ale at the designated location and slay the Gyr Abanian mud slugs.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: Ah, adventurer. We were jussst preparing to go hunting. It is a duty in which we take great pride, but I fear the risssk to my sisters only grows in recent daysss.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: Our greatest weapon is the poison-tipped arrow. All beasts succumb to its effects quite quickly. All sssave for oneâ”€the Gyr Abanian mud ssslug. Their numbers have increasssed of late, which makes hunting all the more difficult.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: Their resistance to our poisonsss leaves us with no choice but to fight in close quartersss, and therein liesss the problem.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: They attack by ssspitting. It appearsss ineffectual against most creaturesss, but is highly corrosive to our ssskin.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: The Lady of Blisss would surely be cross if we marred the beautiful ssskin she's blessed us with. That is why I would ask you to thin their numbers in our ssstead.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: Take thisss bottle of flat ale. Ssscatter it about the grounds north of here, and ssslay any slugs that are drawn by the sssmell.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: When the ssslugs come, be careful of their ssspit. I don't know what effect it will have on ssstriders.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: You've returned, and no worssse for wear. We are lucky to have made friends with one so capable.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: Tell me, did you also find the ssslugs to be repulsssive?

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: Their ssslimy backs and unsssightly squirming. I can think of no creature more hideousss than the ssslug.

dialogue.name: JAYANTI
dialogue.text: Yet you seem unaffected both by their sssaliva and their grotesque visssage. If they pose a threat to usss again, I will be sssure to call you.
